evidence.claim: Meritage Medical Network utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
The company is HIPAA compliant and follows strict data handling practices.
They support EDI X12 transaction sets for healthcare billing processes.
Meritage incorporates FHIR standards for interoperability in their health data exchange.
Their cloud infrastructure also integrates with Azure for data processing needs.
They leverage HL7 standards in their systems for electronic health information exchange.

icp.icp_reason: Company processes X12 transactions and values API automation for healthcare data.
